text:
Good job, Hiori.
Today's work went smoothly.

Well, it's thanks to you, Producer.
Thank you.
Huh? I didn't really do much...

You mentioned something at lunch, Producer.
About "ways to convey without words"...

It's not just about words, but also about expressions
and reactions... There are many ways to convey.

I thought it wasn't just about taste,
so I tried to be conscious of conveying through expressions.

I see...
No wonder I thought you had a nice smile.

...Thank you.
I was worried if it didn't come across to you, Producer.

Haha, of course it did.
Not just to me, but I'm sure to the fans as well.

Okay...
I'm relieved to hear that.
